items.translated_title: Inside Uzbekistan’s nationwide license plate surveillance system

images.alt: a map of Uzbekistan showing a hundred or so red dot markers revealing the location of license plate readers across the country.
an image of four photos of the same image, zoomed in, showing a license plate reader identifying and clocking a vehicle as violating traffic rules.
a screenshot of the Uzbek license plate scanning web dashboard, showing a license plate reader identifying and clocking a vehicle as violating traffic rules.

items.content: The Uzbek government's national license plate scanning system was discovered exposed to the internet for anyone to access without a password.
